Maxmaps is in the office
We need the hype hippo.

> 
> i wanna be part of this endeavour

It's been a privilege hyping with all these people, glad you could join us! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Come on! Lets break the light speed barrier!

Rock!

WE HAVE TO HEAD BANG OUR WAY THROUGH THIS BARRIER!
Holy Mother of Kraken, I can't keep up! New page every time I go to the next!

> 
> My comment for every HypeTrain thread as it nears release:
> It's like a New Year's Eve party with no clocks, everyone is excited and full of anticipation but no one is exactly sure when the big moment will come.

Perfectly said sir.

> 
> [http://www.kbenedetti.com/ksp/users.png](http://www.kbenedetti.com/ksp/users.png)
> YOOWWWWZA!

HarvesterR is ON! Probably Typing up the announcement!
Hyyyype, go for launch

So, that's how people get thousands of posts!

I mean... HYPE!
Red Iron Crown give us a few minutes we can do it to 300

> 
> My comment for every HypeTrain thread as it nears release:
> It's like a New Year's Eve party with no clocks, everyone is excited and full of anticipation but no one is exactly sure when the big moment will come.

That's half the fun. It's like the countdown to midnight that keeps restarting every 10 seconds because nobody thought to bring a digital watch!
release kraken 1.0

> 
> My comment for every HypeTrain thread as it nears release:
> It's like a New Year's Eve party with no clocks, everyone is excited and full of anticipation but no one is exactly sure when the big moment will come.

I like that analogy!
Go/no go?
Engage flux capacitor at 8800mph!
I think we're going at plaid 6.358
the last button is broken, every time I wanna go to "last", there are more pages behind it...![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
I clicked the Last Page button and when it loaded there were two more pages.
Closing in on 280!
can we upgrade the kraken to chathulu once and for all

> 
> Come on! Lets break the light speed barrier!

You've got to be kidding me! We just broke plaid factor 6!
Brace yourselves we will be crossing the 297 page barrier fairly soon!
20 pages to 300, people! So much hype!
